inclusion.criterion: Progressive Metastatic Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Absence of Progressive Metastatic Castrate Resistant Prostate Cancer

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl. He experiences slowness of movement, tremors, and difficulty initiating movements.
